definition: to eat out/to eat at a restaurant
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
variant of 館|馆[guan3]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: To some men marriage is a bit like being in a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 对有的男人来说，结婚就有点像上馆子。

sentences.english: They usually eat out on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 星期天他们通常上馆子吃饭。

sentences.english: We ate out to celebrate Mom's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我们上馆子吃饭来庆祝妈妈的生日。

sentences.english: I'm too tired to cook. Shall we eat out tonight?
sentences.chinese: 我太累了不想做饭了。我们上馆子怎么样？

sentences.english: Japanese businessman invited a Jewish painter to eat out.
sentences.chinese: 有一个日本商人请一位犹太画家上馆子吃饭。

sentences.english: Restaurants are great, but can they beat a homecooked meal?
sentences.chinese: 餐馆好虽好，但上馆子会比吃自家烹调的餐点更好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind eating out this evening?
sentences.chinese: 你介意今晚上馆子吃饭吗？

sentences.english: Do you eat out a lot in London?
sentences.chinese: 你们在伦敦经常上馆子吃饭吗？

definition: to eat out/to eat at a restaurant
to eat out/to eat at a restaurant
to give a dinner party/to entertain guests/to invite to dinner
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to order dishes (in a restaurant)
to have a large and sumptuous meal (traditionally on the 1st and 15th of each month)
restaurant/theater (old)
an ordinary meal/simple home cooking
restaurant/CL:家[jia1]
to start providing food/to open today's service in a canteen
nighttime snack/late-night supper
to settle an account
restaurant/hotel/CL:家[jia1],個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
to pool resources (for a gift, project etc)
a good meal/sumptuous food
